ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Printing pedagogical records and documentation and other literature

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Printing pedagogical records and documentation and other literature

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Printing pedagogical records and documentation and other literature

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Printing pedagogical records and documentation and other literature.

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Condition for signing the agreement with the most favorable bidder is the provision of a guarantee by the selected most favorable bidder for quality performance of the Agreement in an amount of 10% of the value of the Agreement.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — statement by the economic operator that in the last 5 years it was not sentenced with an effective verdict for participation in a criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— certificate that no insolvency procedure is open by a competent Authority,
— certificate that no liquidation procedure is open by a competent Authority,
— certificate for paid taxes, contributions and other public charges by a competent Authority from the country where the economic operator is registered,

— certificate from the Register of penalties for performed criminal acts of the legal entities, that it was not sentenced with a minor penalty for participation in procedures for open invitation, awarding agreements on public procurement and public-private partnership agreements,

— certificate by the Register of penalties for performed criminal acts of the legal entities that it was not sentenced with a minor penalty — temporary or permanent prohibition for performance of a specific activity, and

— certificate that with an effective verdict it was not sentenced with a sanctioned offence — prohibition for performing vocation, business activity or duty, that is, temporary prohibition for performing a specific activity.

EAF_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: The economic operator delivers a report on the balance sheet certified by a competent Authority, that is, revised balance sheet, or excerpts from the report on the balance sheet in cases where publishing of the balance sheet is prescribed by law in the country where the economic operator is registered.

EAF_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: The minimal condition for participation by the economic operator is that it should have accomplished positive financial result in its operations in the past 3 years.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — certificates from at least 3 largest suppliers in the last year on timely and quality performance of printing,
— statement on engaged technical staff and technical authorities regardless of whether they belong to the economic operator directly,
— statement of technical equipment with an automatic hardcover making machine,

— statement on the technical equipment with the machine for book sewing machine, machine for folding sheets and competence of the economic operator for the other potentials that it disposes of for performance of the specific services and for provision of quality,
— notification about the elements of the agreement that the economic operator intends to cede to a subcontractor,

— on the day of opening of the bids, the bidders should mandatorily submit a copy of each of the documents pursuant to the Specifications 1 and 2, and signed with the rulebooks on keeping pedagogical records and documentation (the bidders that will not submit the required copies on the day of opening, shall not be taken into consideration in the further evaluation).

Note: Because it is a matter of permanent documentation, it should have the specifics pursuant to the Rulebooks indicated in Item 1.6З. For this reason, for the purpose of verification of the weight, the quality and the adequacy of the delivered samples, the Commission on Public Procurements will engage an independent external institution.

If during the control of samples, deviations are found in regard to the dimensions, the quality and the remaining characteristics specified in the rulebooks indicated in Item 1.6.2 and the technical specifications, which are an integral part of this tender documentation, the economic operator will be eliminated from the further evaluation procedure.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — the economic operator or its subcontractor should dispose of a machine for book sewing machine,
— the economic operator or its subcontractor should dispose of a machine for folding sheets,
— the economic operator or his subcontractor to dispose of an automatic hardcover making machine,
— quality cooperation with at least 3 suppliers in the last year.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: The Agreement on public procurement will be awarded with an open procedure, which will be completed with an electronic auction as the last stage in the procedure. This procedure will not be conducted by applying electronic means through the Electronic Public Procurement System (EPPS), except in the part of the electronic auction which is compulsorily conducted through the EPPS (https://www.e-nabavki.gov.mk).

More detailed information on the use of electronic means: in order to be able to participate in the electronic auction, you should register in the EPPS. The economic operator registers in the EPPS by filling a registration form which is an integral part of the EPPS, whereupon the EPPS automatically processes the data from the registration form, generates a code and delivers the same to the registered email of the economic operator.

More information about the manner of registration and use of the system you can find in the Manual on use of the EPPS intended for economic operators, which you can download from the home page of the EPPS in the part “Economic operators”.
More detailed information about the electronic auction:

The Contracting Authority will use electronic auction as the last stage in the open procedure. Subject of the electronic auction is the total price including all costs and discounts and import duties, excluding VAT. Initial price of the electronic auction is the lowest price of the acceptable bids submitted in the initial stage of the procedure. The invitations for participation at the auction will be delivered electronically through the EPPS after complete evaluation of the initial bids, to all economic operators which delivered acceptable bids in the initial stage of the procedure and which are registered in the EPPS.

The invitation for participation at the auction will be electronically sent in the mailbox of the user profile in the EPPS of the contact person indicated in the Template for bid which is previously registered in the EPPS.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: Bureau for Development of Education, str. Rugjer Boshkovikj 20, Skopje Republic of Macedonia.

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: Authorised representatives of the bidders, members of the Procurement Committee of BDE
